name: Solar System (itch) (martink100)
description:
For this project i added extra planets, Mercury, Mars and Jupiter. i then added a new prefab to a slow comet spawner and added that into the scene. i adjusted both cameras so that they could see all the planets and the max distance so the planets would not go too far and stop loading. finally i changed the speed in which all of them would rotate around the sun. 

Credits

Created by Martin Kearney
